CREATE VIEW node_status AS (
SELECT node.nodeid as nodeid,
COALESCE( (SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN alarms.severity IS NULL OR alarms.severity < 3 THEN 3 ELSE alarms.severity END) FROM alarms WHERE alarms.nodeid = node.nodeid), 3 ) AS max_alarm_severity,
COALESCE( (SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN alarms.severity IS NULL OR alarms.severity < 3 THEN 3 ELSE alarms.severity END) FROM alarms WHERE alarms.nodeid = node.nodeid and alarms.alarmAckTime IS NULL), 3 ) AS max_alarm_severity_unack,
(SELECT COUNT(alarms.alarmid) FROM alarms WHERE alarms.nodeid = node.nodeid and alarms.alarmAckTime IS NULL) AS alarm_count_unack,
(SELECT count(*) FROM alarms WHERE alarms.nodeid=node.nodeid) AS alarm_count,
COALESCE( (SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN events.eventSeverity IS NULL OR events.eventSeverity < 3 THEN 3 ELSE events.eventSeverity END) FROM outages JOIN events ON outages.svcLostEventId=events.eventid WHERE events.nodeid=node.nodeid AND outages.svcRegainedEventId IS NULL), 3 ) AS max_outage_severity
FROM node );
